name: Haxbot AI: Strategy
description:
Imagine if Rock Paper Scissors had strategy to it, now imagine that you can train your very own AI to learn to get good at learning the strategy of said game, well that is exactly what Haxbot AI: Strategy is all about!

Create a Haxbot & an AI Brain configuration of your choice & train it to become so good at learning strategy that you can't even beat it yourself!
